title: WTT: Dingman postcard for, wait for it, another Dingman postcard...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: WTT: Dingman postcard for, wait for it, another Dingman postcard...
posts.post_content:
So I have an Oakland Oaks Dingman postcard which I've owned for some time.  I was curious if anyone had a different team and they were perhaps interested in a trade.  An equitable trade would be great, so if either party had to include some cards/funds, I'm fine with that.

Please message me if you should have another team available.  Thank you.  :)

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]https://www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/seablaster/postcards/71441/dingman-rppc[/IMG]
